A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just all around bad. 15 minute chase scene stretched out into 2 1/2 hours. No character development\, no logic (bombs do not \"drop\" in zero gravity\" and space fuel?? etc..) and a total disregard for The Force Awakens\, and the mysteries that movie introduced. Constant humor\, and the way they handled Luke\, and the Force\, I mean they have introduced Force powers that would have come in real handy in the last 7 movies\, why now? It's like this guy never seen Star Wars.
